extendedInfo.description: This is the new edition 2 of the old unofficial ESPN news app "Sports News Center" (over 220,000 downloads).This app is a ESPN sports news reader to help you get sports news, scores, stangings...... and watch ESPN sports highlight videos on your phone.Sports news include:- Sports headlines- ESPN Sports live scores, include sports:  ESPN NBA  ESPN MLB  ESPN NFL  ESPN NHL  ESPN Major League Soccer  ESPN Soccer  ESPN Golf  ESPN F1 Results  ESPN Nascar Results  ESPN Nascar Standings  ESPN Autos Results  ESPN Autos Standings  ESPN Tennis  ESPN WNBA  ESPN NCAA  ESPN NCAA Men's Basketball  ESPN NCAA Football  ESPN NCAA Womem's Basketball  ESPN MMA- NBA:  Live Scores  Standings  Team Stats  Individual Stats  Daily Leaders  Player  Analysis  RUMOR CENTRAL  Live Odds  All NBA teams informations- MLB:  Live Scores  Standings  Daily Leaders  League Leaders  Analysis  Player  Pitching Probables  RUMOR CENTRAL  Transactions  Daily Line  Live Odds  All MLB teams informations- NFL:  Live Scores  Standings  Team Stats  League Leaders  Daily Leaders  RUMOR CENTRAL  Analysis  Player  Live Odds  All NFL teams informations- NHL:  Live Scores  Standings  Team Stats  League Leaders  Player  Live Odds  All NHL teams informationsAnd include other sports:- Golf sport- F1 sport- Autos sport- Tennis sport- Soccer sport- Men's college basketball sport- Men's college football sport- All college sports- M L S sport- Pro Women's Basketball - Womem's college basketball sport- MMA sport- Boxing sport...Not affiliated with ESPN, all content remains copyright ESPN.

reviews.comment: Love being able to keep up with my favorite players and teams.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: No cricket? Would like to see nationality shown for players in golf listings. Football teams are abbreviated to 3 or 4 letters, making it not so easy to scan results, but Athletic Bilbao spelled in full. Why? If these points are remedied I\'ll give an extra star. All in all a very good app for sports fans.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bet ESPN at their own game...
reviews.comment: Use to use the ESPN scoreboard app...Just got tired of performance issues! Went searching and found this app. All of espn\'s data but none of their issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s the point?
reviews.comment: Works ok. Just don\'t see any benefit over directly using ESPN mobile web. Only point seems to be an interface that allows the owner to make money off ads.
reviews.author: Stu Martin

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Great job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutey crap. Slow & poorly designed compared to the last espn app.

reviews.title: Great App

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: App is loaded with below average material. Not well setup for Ice Cream Sandwich and having to join some dopey club to get  information  from writers the level of Jason Stark is an insult. Could be much better.

reviews.comment: I love it best app ever for fantast sports and bettors

reviews.comment: Nice app, sending breaking news alerts to device would make it even nicer!  Motorola electrify

reviews.title: Prefer Original App
reviews.comment: Nice UI but the original app was simple. You have to click on a lot of tabs to get to scores and standings. Looking for a better app.

reviews.comment: Great App

reviews.title: No tension
reviews.comment: I don\'t care if I forget to see a match. I have this in my pocket.I open this app and get the score. If you don\'t trust me just download it see the result.
reviews.author: Varun Seth
